sentence: In the late 2000s, Michael Farris, founder of the advocacy group Home School Legal Defense Association (HSLDA) as well as Patrick Henry College the homeschool-marketed institution briefly attended by Rep. Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina started another nonprofit, ParentalRights.org.
author: Kathryn Joyce
title: "Parental rights" started on the Christian fringe  now it's the GOP's winning issue

sentence: A big part of this play is that Kinzinger, along with neo-conservatives like Rep. Liz Cheney, are battling to regain control over a political party now inundated with more flagrantly corrupt, more flagrantly authoritarian, and more flagrantly incompetent officials like Sen. Josh Hawley and Reps. Madison Cawthorn, Lauren Boebert, and Paul Gosar ascending to prominence.
